p: In the official Flora Europaea and Flora of Bulgaria books, the accepted name of the genus is Micromeria, not Clinopodium [ 5, 6]. In the Bulgarian flora, the genus is represented by four species: Micromeria juliana (L.) Bentham ex Reichenb., Micromeria cristata (Hampe) Griseb, Micromeria dalmatica Bentham ssp. bulgarica (Velen.), and Micromeria frivaldszkyana (Degen) Velen. [ 5]. There are 21 Micromeria species described in Flora Europaea, including M. frivaldszkyana as being a Bulgarian endemic plant [ 6].
